mapper.sql: id, name, code, type, module, action, resource, description, status, parent_id, sort, icon, path, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM permission ORDER BY sort ASC, create_time DESC

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.code, p.type, p.module, p.action, p.resource, p.description, p.status, p.parent_id, p.sort, p.icon, p.path, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM permission p INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.sort ASC
SELECT FROM permission WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY sort ASC, create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE permission SET name = #{name}, code = #{code}, type = #{type}, module = #{module}, action = #{action}, resource = #{resource}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, parent_id = #{parentId}, sort = #{sort}, icon = #{icon}, path = #{path}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id as permissionId, p.name as permissionName, p.code as permissionCode, COUNT(ur.id) as usageCount FROM permission p LEFT JOIN role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.department_id = #{departmentId} GROUP BY p.id, p.name, p.code ORDER BY usageCount DESC
